name: ZKL Star Fighter
description:
Take control of the Zero Knight Lancer, or ZKL, Star Fighter, a remote controlled space ship whose duty is to protect a space station containing the last of humankind from the constant attack of the Rovan Empire.  Collect resources!  Upgrade your ship!  Upgrade the Space Station!  But fight on!  For the future of humanity!

This is my first ever publicly published game.  I've been working on it very, very slowly over a few years.  I had previously released it with a few bugs that I did not feel like fixing.  But now I have returned and fixed those things.

Just as an FYI, since I am using royalty-free sounds, I will not be asking for any money for this game.  It would be wrong to use profit from someone else's work, especially without direct permission to do so.

Thank you and enjoy.
